wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase}}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square             <h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">
             Top Stories

             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">

                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>

           <div class="article-list article-list--top-story">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/ct-style/take-control-of-your-vein-health-with-a-fast-easy-screening-at-jefferson-radiology/">
                 Take control of your vein health with a fast, easy screening at Jefferson Radiology
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/ct-style/take-control-of-your-vein-health-with-a-fast-easy-screening-at-jefferson-radiology/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6450435">

      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806214" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="‘Hoarding was an issue’: 2 injured, woman and 2 pets dead following house fire in Chester" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/middlesex/crews-battle-house-fire-in-chester/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

            Middlesex
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T22:24:11-04:00">
            3 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>

         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Meriden man injured in shooting at Fitch Street restaurant following dispute inside restaurant" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/meriden-man-injured-in-shooting-at-fitch-street-restaurant-following-dispute-inside-restaurant/">
            Meriden man injured in shooting at Fitch Street restaurant following dispute inside restaurant
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-1" data-link-label="New Haven" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/">
            New Haven
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T21:35:45-04:00">
            4 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2016/01/new-haven-police_39649827_ver1.0-1.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/meriden-man-injured-in-shooting-at-fitch-street-restaurant-following-dispute-inside-restaurant/">

         </figure>
        </article>
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="308702" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="2">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Another beautiful weather day today" data-link-pinned="true" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/storm-team-8-weather/forecast/todays-forecast/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

        <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-11">
         <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--dropin" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="articleListCarousel" data-context="carousel_dropin">
          <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
           The Latest Video from News 8
          </h2>
          <div class="article-list__content">
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805007" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="0">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/on-air/thisweekinconnecticut/this-week-in-ct-opioid-overdoses-increased-during-pandemic-new-neighborhood-near-dunkin-donuts-park/">
               This Week in CT: Opioid overdoses increased during pandemic; New neighborhood near Dunkin’ Donuts Park
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/on-air/thisweekinconnecticut/">
               This Week in Connecticut
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-21T19:43:34-04:00">
               6 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/on-air/thisweekinconnecticut/this-week-in-ct-opioid-overdoses-increased-during-pandemic-new-neighborhood-near-dunkin-donuts-park/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6456613">

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806020" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="1">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/on-air/thisweekinconnecticut/local-paramedics-first-hand-look-at-the-deadly-toll-of-drug-use-amid-the-pandemic/">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

              </a>

               16 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/hartford/just-hang-in-there-youll-find-a-slot-in-the-next-few-days-connecticuts-status-in-the-covid-19-vaccine-rollout/">
               ‘Just hang in there, you’ll find a slot in the next few days’: Connecticut’s status in the COVID-19 vaccine rollout
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/hartford/">
               Hartford
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-20T06:07:52-04:00">
               2 days ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/hartford/just-hang-in-there-youll-find-a-slot-in-the-next-few-days-connecticuts-status-in-the-covid-19-vaccine-rollout/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6456010">
                <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="256px" src="https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=1752&amp;h=986&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://www.wtnh.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/100/2021/03/b56a03f707134903970af637f856875a.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>

            </figure>
           </article>

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805225" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="10">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-london/remaining-distancing-guidelines-may-keep-establishments-from-reaching-100-capacity/">
               Distancing guidelines make reaching full capacity a challenge for some establishments
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-london/">
               New London
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-19T17:21:17-04:00">
               2 days ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-london/remaining-distancing-guidelines-may-keep-establishments-from-reaching-100-capacity/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6454295">

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805088" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="11">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/health/hartford-healthcare-urologist-brings-awareness-to-risks-signs-of-kidney-cancer/">
               Hartford HealthCare urologist brings awareness to risks, signs of kidney cancer
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

               Health
              </a>
              /

               3 days ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/health/health-headlines-can-baby-aspirin-prevent-illness-from-covid-is-the-astrazeneca-covid-vaccine-safe/">

              </a>

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

        <section class="article-list article-list--headline-two-col" data-context="homepage_top_stories">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched article-list__heading--bottom-divider">
          Top Stories
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">

            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/health/coronavirus/how-ct-residents-45-and-up-can-register-for-the-covid-19-vaccine-starting-friday/">

             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

             </a>

             </time>
            </footer>

              </div>
              <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">

                </svg>
               </span>
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                Video
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </a>
           </figure>
          </article>

                 <defs>
                  <style>
                   .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                  </style>
                 </defs>
                 <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">

                </svg>
               </span>
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">

             </div>

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805225" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="3">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-london/remaining-distancing-guidelines-may-keep-establishments-from-reaching-100-capacity/">
                Distancing guidelines make reaching full capacity a challenge for some establishments
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-london/">
                New London
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-19T17:21:17-04:00">
                2 days ago
               </time>
              </footer>
              <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <defs>
                  <style>
                   .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                  </style>
                 </defs>
                 <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </span>
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                Video
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>

             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Crime
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806469" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/meriden-man-injured-in-shooting-at-fitch-street-restaurant-following-dispute-inside-restaurant/">
                Meriden man injured in shooting at Fitch Street restaurant following dispute inside restaurant
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/">
                New Haven
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T21:35:45-04:00">
                4 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806370" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="1">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/middlesex/watch-middletown-pd-looking-for-teens-caught-on-camera-stealing-car/">
                WATCH: Middletown PD looking for teens caught on camera stealing car
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/middlesex/">
                Middlesex
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T19:16:14-04:00">
                7 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>

           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Unusual Stories

           </div>
          </article>
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806469" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="4">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wtnh.com/news/connecticut/new-haven/meriden-man-injured-in-shooting-at-fitch-street-restaurant-following-dispute-inside-restaurant/">
              Meriden man injured in shooting at Fitch Street restaurant following dispute inside restaurant
             </a>
            </h3>
           </div>
          </article>
         </div>
        </section>
       </section>
